Utility

Source: src/components/utility/utility

The Utility Component contains feature links or buttons specific to a view.

Demonstration

Programs Contact Save Share

Markup 

<nav class="c-utility">
  <a class="btn-link me-auto" href="/demos/programs/index">
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-wnyc-ui">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-wnyc-ui-chevron-left"></use>
    </svg>
    <span>Programs</span>
  </a>
  <a class="ms-3 btn btn-link" href="#contact">Contact</a>
  <a class="btn btn-small btn-primary">
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-wnyc-ui">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-wnyc-ui-bookmark"></use>
    </svg>
    <span>Save</span>
  </a>
  <a class="btn btn-small btn-primary" data-js="web-share" data-web-share="{&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Page Title&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Description to of the shared content.&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;https://url/to/share&quot;}" href="#">
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-wnyc-ui">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-wnyc-ui-share-2"></use>
    </svg>
    <span>Share</span>
  </a>
</nav>
